entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Datepicker Two-Way Binding On Android #9180
  • Windows startup performance - time spent loading WindowsAppSdk `.xaml` #9179
  • EF Core with Sqlite throws System.ExecutionEngineException running on iOS Device (Release) #9176
  • Error boundary message does not display on mobile devices #9175
  • Keyboard covers the editor Still exist #9171
  • Android does not handle images/splash/icons with the same name and overwrites #9170
    Backlog
  • iOS / MacCatalyst does not handle images/splash/icons with the same name and overwrites #9169
    Backlog
  • Tizen does not handle images/splash/icons with the same name and overwrites #9168
    Backlog
  • Determine whether splash screen should respect base size of foreground scale - or both #9166
    Backlog
  • Button not showing when under a CollectionView in StackLayout on iOS #9164
  • ListView/CollectionView memory leak under Windows #9162
  • Cannot debug .NET MAUI Android project on real Android physical device #9159

Closed

  • Blazor Desktop tenets: Accessibility #2541
    7.0-rc1
  • Improve Resizetizer #7970
  • Android does not automatically update the manifests with MauiIcon #7971
  • iOS / Mac Catalyst does not automatically update the manifests with MauiIcon #9172
  • Tizen manifest updater updates the manifest in the working directory instead of obj #9167
  • BackgroundColor not changed #5380
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Maui Essentials WebAuthenticator not working in WinUI #2702
  • Generate the manifest/plist entries for reseizetizer #5883
  • [Windows] - DisplayPromptAsync buttons order #9165
  • CollectionView support column header #9160
  • [Android] AOT not working, app crashes after start #9163

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9158
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 7
  • Convert Controls.Tests from NUnit to xUnit #9123
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add public triage information #9136
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, .NET 7
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, .NET 7 Planning
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
